Bash(gh pr create --title "Add PDFH web application" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Implements a complete React + TypeScript + Vite web application for creating and viewing PDFH files
- Adds PDFH core library for embedding HTML within PDFs and extracting it back
- Includes GitHub Actions workflow for automatic deployment to GitHub Pages

## Features
- **Creator Mode**: Monaco HTML editor with live preview, PDFH-1a/1b conformance options, generate & download
- **Viewer Mode**: Drag & drop file upload, PDF rendering, PDFH detection, side-by-side HTML extraction
- **Core Library**: Creates PDFs with embedded HTML \(pdf-lib\), extracts HTML from PDFH files
- **UI/UX**: Dark/light mode toggle, responsive design, Tailwind CSS styling

## Tech Stack
- React 18, TypeScript, Vite
- pdf-lib \(PDF creation/modification\)
- pdfjs-dist \(PDF rendering\)
- Monaco Editor \(HTML editing\)
- Tailwind CSS \(styling\)

- [ ] Test dark/light mode toggle
- [ ] Merge and verify GitHub Pages deployment at https://mjamiv.github.io/PDFH/
